page.title: 11Housing-Gloucester
page.content: In Gloucester there are many kinds of houses.There are bungalows, flats,cottages,farm-houses and terraced,detached and semi-detached houses.About 30 years ago there were not many housing estates in Gloucester.But as the price of land went up people sold it off and big estates were built. One of the housing estates is called{Coppice}Corner.Between 49 and 70 AD Coppice Corner was a Roman burial ground with 600 bodies buried there.The archaeologists found many skeletons when they excavated the area.Bryants Homes bought it in 1983. 70 houses are built already and altogether there will be 106 when it is finished.I don't think it will expand because it is surrounded by roads,other houses,and Oxstalls playing fields.
